title: There's Sass In It
report: After discovering and harvesting large amounts of Sassafrass I attempted to make Safrole tea by gently simmering and mashing 1 pd of fresh sassafras bark. Drank proscribed amount in one shot and wow  even in raw tea form this precursor to mdma and mda puts a happy spin on everything for several hours.

erowid.citation: pan. "There's Sass In It: experience with Sassafras (ID 66453)". Erowid.org. Feb 6, 2008. erowid.org/exp/66453
